io.micronaut.http.client

Interface RxHttpClientRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RxNettyHttpClientRegistry

    @Internal
public interface RxHttpClientRegistry
    Internal interface for managing the construction and lifecycle of instances of RxHttpClient.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
